This page displays the available administration sections available from within the application.  

[IMG]

There are two sections:
 * [User_Admin User administration] - used to create / delete users or change your own password.
 * [iPiMP_Admin iPiMP administration - which allows you to update various iPiMP settings, alter the iPiMP appearance or manage !MediaPortal clients access via the application.
